title: Awesome Studio in Kenmore! Heat and hot water included!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 303316460', 'Rent: $2,500 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Spacious and charming Kenmore Square studio apartment located in a professionally managed brownstone building.', 'Unit features include hardwood floors, high ceilings and decorative fireplace.', 'Available now or August 1st 2022.', 'Heat and hot water included.', '1 months broker fee.', 'Call now!', 'Bus: 55 Ipswich St @ Lansdowne St (0.39 mi)', 'Bus: 8 Brookline Ave opp Newbury St (0.22 mi)', 'Bus: Green Line D Shuttle Kenmore (0.27 mi)', 'Tram: D Kenmore (0.31 mi)', 'Tram: C Saint Marys Street (0.42 mi)', 'Bus: 47 Park Dr @ Mountfort St (0.28 mi)', 'Rail: Framingham/Worcester Line Yawkey (0.18 mi)', 'Bus: 57 Commonwealth Ave @ Silber Way (0.04 mi)', 'Tram: B Blandford Street (0.07 mi)', 'Bus: CT2 Amesbury St @ Vassar St (0.33 mi)', 'Val Temin', '6177845998', 'If you would like to take a look at additional apartment options please see below:', 'https://ygl.is/valvel-temin', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
